department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply of GalinSn-Indium-Tin Alloy for one year contract term
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on January 26, 2024 by 2:00pm EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00pm EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
### Contract for GalinSn-Indium-Tin Alloy Purchase

**Solicitation Number:** WS4359534284
**Publication Date:** January 11, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** January 26, 2024, 2:00 pm EDT

#### Amendment to Tender:

The tender closing date has been amended. Please note that the deadline for submitting required supporting documentation and the bid submission is January 26, 2024, at 2:00 pm EDT. Any bids received after this deadline will be declared non-responsive.

### Contract Requirements

Public Services and Procurement Canada is seeking a contract for the purchase of GalinSn-Indium-Tin Alloy with a term of one (1) firm year.

### Debriefing Process

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process within five (5) working days from receiving the results. The debriefing can be provided in writing, by telephone, or in person.

#### Mandatory Documents

A notification email will be sent to respondents with authorization to access the solicitation and the supporting documents.

#### Federal Government Trade Agreement and Regulations

This solicitation is subject to the **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)** and all relevant regulations.

#### Regions of Delivery

Shipments are expected to be made to the **National Capital Region (NCR)**.

#### End Users

The expected end-users are **Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)**.

#### Contracting Entity Details

**Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
**Contracting Entity Address:**
	* Address Line: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
	* City: Gatineau
	* Province: Quebec
	* Postal Code: K1A 0S5
	* Country: Canada
**Contact Information:**
	* Email: [erin.oneill@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:erin.oneill@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	* Name: Erin (she/her) O'Neill (SPAC/PSPC)

#### More Details on the Solicitation

Visit the **Buyandsell** posting for more information on the solicitation and required documents. The solicitation key can be found on the Ariba Discovery website ([https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18490028](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18490028)).
